engine.collision
Class AAB

java.lang.Object
  engine.Shape
      engine.collision.AAB
All Implemented Interfaces:
CollisionShape
public class AAB
extends Shape
implements CollisionShape

Class for Axis Aligned Boxes, supporting collision detection

Author:
dgattey
